categories: Category:Imperial Army personnel of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Haxet was a male Human who served as a specialist in the Imperial Army of the Sith Empire. During the Battle of Corellia in the Galactic War, he was stationed in Coronet Spaceport in the Incorporation Islands region of the planet Corellia, distributing armor to other Imperial forces.
Specialist Haxet appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as an Light Armor Vendor for Imperial players on Corellia.
